mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_user (userPk, property, id, team, myProperty, bResult, success, win, lose, draw) VALUES (#{userPk}, #{property}, #{id}, #{team}, #{myProperty}, #{bResult}, #{success}, #{win}, #{lose}, #{draw})
mapper.select: SELECT A.date, A.completed, A.lid, A.rid, A.lscore, A.rscore, B.bResult, B.team, B.property FROM rmatch AS A LEFT JOIN b_user AS B ON B.id = A.id WHERE b.userPk = #{userPk} ORDER BY b.idx DESC
SELECT SUM(property)/SUM(win) AS w_allocation, SUM(property)/SUM(draw) AS d_allocation, SUM(property)/SUM(lose) AS l_allocation FROM b_user WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT A.bResult, A.property, A.team, A.myProperty, B.lid, B.lscore, B.rscore, B.rid, B.date FROM b_user A INNER JOIN rmatch B ON A.id = B.id WHERE B.completed = 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE b_user A , pgruser B SET A.myProperty = A.success + A.myProperty, A.bResult = A.success - A.property, B.myProperty = A.success + A.myProperty WHERE A.userPk = B.userPk AND A.id = #{id}
